name: Affordable Price
description: My template-based development works efficiently, so I can offer the pricing of 70 - 90% cheaper than the average cost of creating a website through a freelancer.

name: High Performance
description: My websites perform fast and accurately. Speed and accuracy are crucial factors in user experience and search engine optimization.

name: Search Engine Optimization
description: Search Engine Optimization(SEO) is a process to help search engines like Google to crawl your website better, so the website acquires higher priority in the search results. I follow the best practices when I create my templates so they can obtain more user access from the internet.

name: Responsive Design
description: My templates are designed to be responsive to various device type. You can expect many users accessing your website from different devices without any problems.

name: Manegable Contents
description: All of my tempaltes are provided with the dedicated control panel for you to manage your contents easily without going through hassle to communicate with me.

name: Upgradable
description: My templates are packed with the essential components required for a portfolio website, but you may also upgrade it with additional feature if needed. Blog and E-Commerce are the currently offered additional feature, and more feature will be updated in the future.

name: Optimized for Social Media
description: My templates come with Open Graph meta tags, which displays a brief information about your website as intended when you share the link of your website on social media. It makes your share look more legitimate and informative to the users.
